User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; X11; Linux x86_64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111103145528

Steps to reproduce:

When the user password is changed on our server and thunderbird is open after that. 


Actual results:

At least 2 popup windows appear for entering the new password. (one for pop/imap and one other for smtp) In our case we have another popup for our SOGo groupware extension. 


Expected results:

I think it will be VERY great and more user friendly if we have the possibility to have a checkbox or anything else similar in the first popup who say: "use this password for smtp and other addons for this account". it will reduce the number of time we have to write the password and this will be less confusing for end user.

I think it's a very good enhancement to do..
